text: When humans first saw the camel, they were frightened, and frightened by its size, they began to flee. But as time went on, seeing that he was harmless, they were encouraged and came near him. Then, gradually seeing that the animal did not know the cholera, they domesticated it to the point of placing a bridle on it, giving it to the children to drive. The unknown must be treated with suspicion and prudence.
title: El camello visto por primera vez
author: nan Esopo
